title: FSH: T206 Izzy Hoffman, Providence~ Polar Bear *SOLD*

posts.post_title: FSH: T206 Izzy Hoffman, Providence~ Polar Bear *SOLD*
posts.post_content:
I am looking for $SOLD or best offer on this nice looking Hoffman. (I have this listed on ebay for more than I am asking here) I purchased this card on the bst a year or so ago.

I will take care of the shipping costs.


[URL=http://smg.photobucket.com/user/bunker9603/media/Top-001bmp-18.jpg.html][IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v498/bunker9603/Top-001bmp-18.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://smg.photobucket.com/user/bunker9603/media/T206/Topbmp.jpg.html][IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v498/bunker9603/T206/Topbmp.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[quote name="Bunker" post=1235435]I am looking for $39.00 or best offer on this nice looking Hoffman. (I have this listed on ebay for more than I am asking here) I purchased this card on the bst a year or so ago.

[URL=http://smg.photobucket.com/user/bunker9603/media/Top-001bmp-18.jpg.html][IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v498/bunker9603/Top-001bmp-18.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://smg.photobucket.com/user/bunker9603/media/T206/Topbmp.jpg.html][IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v498/bunker9603/T206/Topbmp.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/QUOTE]

Bottom left corner appears to have a bat ear.  Is this card trimmed?

Best regards,

Eric
